article.title: Nichols Assigned to Office of the Under Secretary of Defense (Personnel and Readiness)

tags.tag: Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness

article.text: Maj. Gen. Camille M. Nichols, USA, has been assigned as director, Sexual Assault Prevention and Response Office, Department of Defense Human Resources Activity, Office of the Under Secretary of Defense (Personnel and Readiness), Alexandria, Virginia.
